function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of compliance with social distancing and containment measures","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing regulations, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance technology for monitoring compliance","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, law enforcement"},{"Description":"Overcrowding in public venues and attractions","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Temporary closure of public venues, capacity restrictions, crowd management measures","Technologies":"Public health monitoring tools, crowd sensing technology","People":"Visitors to public venues","Owner":"Local authorities, venue management"},{"Description":"Lack of public awareness and education regarding disease prevention measures","Impact":"Higher likelihood of non-compliance and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Public education campaigns, dissemination of accurate information, communication through various media channels","Technologies":"Social media, educational apps, digital communication platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, government"}]}
